statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT M1.SIKIBETSU_CD ,M1.MEISYO_CD AS KAISYA_CD ,M1.MEISYO_NM AS KAISYA_NM ,M1.MEISYOKANA_NM AS KAISYAKANA_NM ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM MDMT0100 M1 WHERE M1.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND M1.MEISYO_CD = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(
